metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3663 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in Axiomatic Bento4. It has been rated as problematic. This issue affects the function AP4_StsdAtom of the file Ap4StsdAtom.cpp of the component MP4fragment. The manipulation leads to null pointer dereference. The attack may be initiated remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used. The associated identifier of this vulnerability is VDB-212003.

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
